name: All the King's Men
description: This gingery cocktail was an instant favorite for us. It's smooth from the Averna, spicy from ginger beer and reposado tequila, and fruity and tart from the addition of ruby port and freshly squeezed lemon juice.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce ruby port (we like Noval Black)
1 to 2 ounces ginger beer (we like Fever Tree)
For garnish: 1 paper-thin slice fresh ginger, 2 blackberries (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the tequila, Averna, port, honey, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake for 15 seconds, until well chilled.

Fill a Collins glass with ice. Simultaneously strain the mixture and pour the ginger beer into the glass. (Or strain mixture into glass, top off with ginger beer, and stir gently.) Garnish with ginger slice and blackberries. Serve immediately.
